features.name: LoginPage
features.description: User authentication page with email/password login via Supabase Auth

features.name: RegisterPage
features.description: New user registration page for team members

features.name: AdminDashboard
features.description: Main dashboard with metrics, process management, team management, reports, and settings

features.name: UploadForm
features.description: Form to upload new legal processes with PDF and video attachments

features.name: LandingPage
features.description: Client-facing page to view their legal process video and PDF with password protection

features.name: SuccessPage
features.description: Confirmation page after successful process upload with confetti animation

features.name: Sidebar
features.description: Navigation sidebar with role-based menu items (admin vs member)

features.name: ConfiguracoesPage
features.description: Settings page for user preferences and whitelabel configuration

features.name: ThemeContext
features.description: Dark/Light mode toggle functionality with localStorage persistence

features.name: PdfVisualEditor
features.description: Visual editor to position QR code on PDF documents
